TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogRecord extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示作为 COM+ 结构传递的未结构化的日志记录。

span.span: Represents an unstructured log record delivered as a COM+ structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非结构化的日志记录都作为 COM + 提供`CrmLogRecordRead`结构。Unstructured log records are delivered as a COM+ `CrmLogRecordRead` structure. 除了用户数据 (单个 BLOB) 中，其中包含可用于调试或查找故障的其他字段。In addition to the user data (a single BLOB), this contains additional fields that are useful for debugging or fault finding. 字段是提供了有关此记录是否已在某些时候，忘记了更多信息位字段，并且当它已写入。The field is a bit field that provides further information about whether this record was forgotten at some point, and when it was written. 字段提供的日志记录的序列号。The field provides the sequence number of the log record. 在大多数情况下，序列号顺序，但不一定是连续的因为不会传递到补偿资源管理器 (CRM) 补偿的内部日志记录。In most cases, sequence numbers are sequential but are not necessarily contiguous due to internal log records that are not delivered to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此类。The following code example demonstrates the use of this class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#28)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Flags As LogRecordFlags

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示何时写入日志记录。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates when the log record was written.

value.span: 一个 值的按位组合，它提供有关何时写入该记录的信息。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which provides information about when this record was written.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Record As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Record { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取日志记录用户数据。

span.span: Gets the log record user data.

value.span: 包含用户数据的单个 BLOB。

span.span: A single BLOB that contains the user data.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#28)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sequence As Integer
public: property int Sequence { int get(); };

span.span: The sequence number of the log record.

value.span: 一个整数值，指定日志记录的序列号。

span.span: An integer value that specifies the sequence number of the log record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列号不一定是连续的因为内部日志记录或忘记了的日志记录不会传递到补偿资源管理器 (CRM) 补偿。Sequence numbers are not necessarily contiguous due to internal log records or forgotten log records which are not delivered to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator.
